CustomField.description: This is a hidden field used by the Project rollup summary to determine the status of all the phases in the Project. This is a system field and must not be visible.
CustomField.formula: IF(project_cloud__Task_Status_Minimum__c = project_cloud__Task_Status_Maximum__c && project_cloud__Task_Status_Minimum__c = 0, 0, IF(project_cloud__Task_Status_Minimum__c = project_cloud__Task_Status_Maximum__c && project_cloud__Task_Status_Minimum__c > 1, 2, 1 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a system field and must not be visible.
CustomField.label: Status Enum
